com.aevi.sdk.config

Interface ConfigClient


  • public interface ConfigClient

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      This API currently relies on a receiver to discover configuration applications To release this receiver and avoid memory leaks please close this client when you are done
      java.lang.String[] getConfigArrayValue(java.lang.String key)
      Returns an array value of a particular key Note that in the case where multiple providers support the same key, it is arbitrary which provider value is retrieved here.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getConfigKeys()
      Deprecated. 
      Please use getLatestConfig() instead
      ConfigResource getConfigResource(java.lang.String key, ConfigResource defaultValue)
      Returns the resource of a particular key
      java.lang.String getConfigValue(java.lang.String key)
      Returns the value of a particular key Note that in the case where multiple providers support the same key, it is arbitrary which provider value is retrieved here.
      ConfigUpdate getLatestConfig()
      Returns the latest config update with list of provider apps and associated keys.
      io.reactivex.Observable<java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> subscribeToConfigurationChanges()
      Deprecated. 
      Please use subscribeToConfigurationUpdates() instead
      io.reactivex.Observable<ConfigUpdate> subscribeToConfigurationUpdates()
      Subscribe to configuration updates from config providers.

    • Method Detail

      • getConfigKeys

        @NonNull
 @Deprecated
java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getConfigKeys()
        Deprecated. Please use getLatestConfig() instead
        Returns the full set of all known configuration keys See getLatestConfig() for a way to retrieve keys plus info about the providers.
        Returns:
        The full set of all known configuration keys. Will be empty if no config implementations found

      • getLatestConfig

        ConfigUpdate getLatestConfig()
        Returns the latest config update with list of provider apps and associated keys.
        Returns:
        Latest config update

      • getConfigValue

        @NonNull
java.lang.String getConfigValue(java.lang.String key)
        Returns the value of a particular key Note that in the case where multiple providers support the same key, it is arbitrary which provider value is retrieved here.
        Parameters:
        key - The key to get
        Returns:
        The value of the key or an empty string if not found

      • getConfigArrayValue

        @NonNull
java.lang.String[] getConfigArrayValue(java.lang.String key)
        Returns an array value of a particular key Note that in the case where multiple providers support the same key, it is arbitrary which provider value is retrieved here.
        Parameters:
        key - The key to get
        Returns:
        An array of String values of the key or an empty string array if not found

      • getConfigResource

        @NonNull
ConfigResource getConfigResource(java.lang.String key,
                                          @NonNull
                                          ConfigResource defaultValue)
        Returns the resource of a particular key
        Parameters:
        key - The key to get
        defaultValue - The default value to return if this key is not found
        Returns:
        The resource matching the given key or defaultValue if not found

      • subscribeToConfigurationChanges

        @NonNull
 @Deprecated
io.reactivex.Observable<java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> subscribeToConfigurationChanges()
        Deprecated. Please use subscribeToConfigurationUpdates() instead
        Subscribe to changes in configurations.
        Returns:
        An observable stream that emits the set of strings for all keys found when a configuration change occurs

      • subscribeToConfigurationUpdates

        @NonNull
io.reactivex.Observable<ConfigUpdate> subscribeToConfigurationUpdates()
        Subscribe to configuration updates from config providers.
        Returns:
        An observable stream that emits a ConfigUpdate model that wraps information about the providers and what keys they support

      • close

        void close()
        This API currently relies on a receiver to discover configuration applications To release this receiver and avoid memory leaks please close this client when you are done
